short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A to-do list extension for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay organized and productive with our 'Things to Do' extension! Easily create lists of tasks you need to complete, and as you finish them, simply tick them off to remove them from your list. Keep track of your to-dos and ensure nothing falls through the cracks. Streamline your day and boost your productivity with our user-friendly task management extension.
